Package com.dtdsoftware.splunk.formatter

Interface Summary
Formatter This interface can be implemented to provide custom formatting logic The custom implementation class can then be placed on the classpath and declared in the configuration xml file.
 

Class Summary
DefaultFormatter Default formatter implementation
FormatterUtils Utility methods for formatting
SplunkFormatter Abstract out a common methods and params for similar formatter implementations
TokenizedMBeanNameFormatter Custom formatter implementation that outputs the mbean canonical name as split up tokens
TokenizedMBeanNameQuotesStrippedFormatter Custom formatter implementation that outputs the mbean canonical name as split up tokens.
